commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Oh, there she is!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Welcome!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hi, guys. Thanks for letting me come watch you practice.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hey, it's our pleasure! You don't even need to get permission first. You're always welcome here!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, uh, I don't think that's how things work.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: She's right, Chika. You wouldn't have wanted her showing up out of the blue during yesterday's fiasco, would you?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Oh, that was hilarious. *Giggle*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yesterday's fiasco?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Chika had such bad bedhead yesterday! It wouldn't calm down the whole day no matter what she did, zura.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: We tried washing it and combing it, but nothing worked. We might've been able to fix it if we had the right kind of styling products, though.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: It was like it was fighting against normalcy at all costs.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It knew what it wanted, and it wouldn't stop no matter what we tried. It really was the perfect hair for Chika-chi!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Argh! You guys, stop it! It was so embarrassing!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Yes, I think that's quite enough talking for now. We need to start practice.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: One, two, three, four, and stop! Let's take a ten-minute break.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Man, Aqours' dancing is unbelievable! I'm learning so much just from watching them!)

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Phew, all that moving around has me exhausted. Lemme use your lap for a bit, Kanan!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Agh! Don't grab onto me like that! You're gonna get us both hurt!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I wanna use your lap too!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Then let's all take a nice, long break on Kanan's lap. Three, two, one, snooore!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Oh, stop it! Where are your manners?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nice hustle, Mari. I brought you a drink.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh, grazie! I was so thirsty!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Here, Mari. I think this is your towel, right?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It sure is. Grazie! A nice fluffy towel is just what your body needs after a workout!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're a lot different when you're with Aqours. Like, you're a lot more laid-back and relaxed.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: You think?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. I can tell you're having fun with Î¼'s and the Nijigasaki girls, but... Hmm, I'm not really sure how to put it...

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: *Giggle* It's fine. You're right. I've been through so much with Aqours. The time I spend with them is so special to me. It's the only time I can really be me.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It's the one place where I don't have to hide any part of myself.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (So the reason Mari is able to be so open, yet down-to-earth is because she's found a home in Aqours.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (A place where she can be fully herself. Somewhere she can always run back to in her time of need. As long as she has that, she can live her life to the fullest.)
